des: "This unique Mexican contemporary cuisine crab-mix is made with surimi (imitation crabmeat) and spicy peppers. Serve with sushi or with crackers."
ins: In a large bowl, use your hands to mix together the imitation crabmeat, onion, serrano peppers, jalapeno peppers, and cream cheese. Season with salt and some of the liquid from the pickled jalapenos if desired. Form the mixture into a ball, and roll in chopped cilantro. Refrigerate until serving.
